snippet: Kelly Reilly, a breakout star of "Flight," says her family in England hasn't seen the movie and is under the impression that since she doesn't appear in the trailer, she's been cut out of the movie.
abstract: Kelly Reilly, a breakout star of "Flight," says her family in England hasn't seen the movie and is under the impression that since she doesn't appear in the trailer, she's been cut out of the movie.
